pages.title: Toppings
pages.text: You can add a topping to your ice cream! There are several types of toppings, from chips to syrups. You can only apply one topping to a serving of ice cream.$(br2)When you top your ice cream, the effects gotten from it are modified depending on the topping.

pages.title: Syrup Topping
pages.text: You can apply any syrup flavor as a topping. When you eat ice cream with that topping, you gain another effect determined by the syrup's flavor. The added effect lasts for half the time.

pages.title: Cookie Chips
pages.text: Cookie Chips have 8 uses. When you eat ice cream topped with them, the effects applied last for twice as long.

pages.title: Rainbow Sprinkles
pages.text: Rainbow Sprinkles have 8 uses. When you eat ice cream topped with them, the effects applied are amplified by 1 level.
